<div class="phs-cookie-popup-area ph-widget-box ph-sticky-header" data-pre-render role="region" key-role="regionRole" aria-label="cookies message" key-aria-label="cookiesMessageAriaLabel" if.bind="showCookiePopup" data-ps="5ae357e4-div-1" v-phw-setting>
    <div class="container" data-ps="5ae357e4-div-2" v-phw-setting>
        <div class="cookie-text-area ${showDeclineButton?'decline-enabled':''}" data-ph-at-id="cookie-text" data-ps="5ae357e4-div-3" v-phw-setting>
            <ppc-content key="cookietextAreaText" data-ph-at-id="cookie-text" data-ps="5ae357e4-ppc-content-1" v-phw-setting>
                We use cookies to offer you a better browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize
                content. Read about how we use cookies and how you can control them by visiting our <a ph-href="cookiesettings" key-ph-href="popupCareerSiteCookieSettingsHrefText" class="cookie-settings" data-ph-at-id="cookie-settings-link" v-phw-setting>Cookie Settings</a> page.
            </ppc-content>
        </div>
        <div class="cookie-button-area ${showDeclineButton?'decline-enabled':''}" data-ps="5ae357e4-div-4" v-phw-setting>
            <a ph-href="cookiesettings" show.bind="showCookieSettingsButton" key-ph-href="popupCareerSiteCookieSettingsHrefText" class="btn plain-button cookie-settings phcriticalhide" data-ph-at-id="cookie-settings-link" role="button" aria-label="Click here to change your Cookie Settings" key-aria-label="popupCookieSettingsAriaLabel" data-ps="5ae357e4-a-2" v-phw-setting>
                <ppc-content key="popupCookieSettingsText" data-ph-at-id="cookie-settings-link-text" data-ps="5ae357e4-ppc-content-2" v-phw-setting>
                    Cookie Settings
                </ppc-content>
            </a>
            <button class="btn primary-button phcriticalhide" show.bind="showDeclineButton" click.delegate="declineAndClose()" data-ph-at-id="cookie-close-link" phae="ph-cookie-popup-v2" phae-type="click" phae-main="3" data-ps="5ae357e4-button-1" v-phw-setting>
                <i class="icon icon-cancel" phae-ref="3" aria-hidden="true" data-ps="5ae357e4-i-1" v-phw-setting></i>
                <ppc-content key="denyCookiesText" data-ph-at-id="cookie-close-link-text" phae-ref="3" data-ps="5ae357e4-ppc-content-3" v-phw-setting>
                    Deny
                </ppc-content>
            </button>
            <button class="btn primary-button" click.delegate="acceptAndClose()" data-ph-at-id="cookie-close-link" phae="ph-cookie-popup-v2" phae-type="click" phae-main="2" data-ps="5ae357e4-button-2" v-phw-setting>
                <i class="icon icon-check-mark" phae-ref="2" data-ps="5ae357e4-i-2" v-phw-setting></i>
                <ppc-content key="allowCookiesText" data-ph-at-id="cookie-close-link-text" phae-ref="2" data-ps="5ae357e4-ppc-content-4" v-phw-setting>
                    Allow
                </ppc-content>
            </button>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="popup-modal-backdrop phcriticalhide" if.bind="piiCosentPopup" data-ps="5ae357e4-div-5" v-phw-setting>

    <div class="widget-container" data-ps="be6e1652-div-3" v-phw-setting>
        <div class="phs-widget-heading" data-ps="be6e1652-div-4" v-phw-setting>
            <h2 if.bind="!hideTitle" data-ps="be6e1652-h2-1" v-phw-setting>
                <ppc-content key="widgetHeadingText" data-ph-at-id="heading-text" data-ps="be6e1652-ppc-content-1" v-phw-setting>

                </ppc-content>
            </h2>
            <p if.bind="!hideSubTitle" data-ps="be6e1652-p-1" v-phw-setting>
                <ppc-content key="widgetSubHeadingText" data-ph-at-id="sub-heading-text" data-ps="be6e1652-ppc-content-2" v-phw-setting>
                    We give you the tools you need to discover your perfect job match, and the freedom and support to take your career to the
                    next level.
                </ppc-content>
            </p>
        </div>
        <div class="content-block" data-ps="be6e1652-div-5" v-phw-setting>
            <div class="${mode}" data-ps="be6e1652-div-6" v-phw-setting>
                <div ph-role="data.bind:categoryViewModel" class="row category-column-${cardsPerRow}" data-ph-at-widget-data-count="${categoryViewModel.length}" data-ph-at-id="category-list-view" data-ps="be6e1652-div-7" v-phw-setting>
                    <div if.bind="mode == 'slider'" class="col-md-${cardStyleClassSuffix} content-list-item" repeat.for="category of currSlideData" data-ps="be6e1652-div-8" v-phw-setting>
                        <a ph-tevent="job_category_click" ref="linkEle" href.bind="getUrl(linkEle, 'category', category)" class="category-${$index + 1} list-item-link" data-ph-at-id="category-link" data-ph-at-category-text="${category.key}" data-ph-at-category-job-count="${category.total_count}" aria-label="${category.key} ${category.total_count} ${category.total_count == 1 ? (widgetBundle['categoryCountSingler']) : (widgetBundle['categoryCountPlural'])}" data-ps="be6e1652-a-1" v-phw-setting>
                            <!-- <figure>
                                <img if.bind="category && category.icon_image" src="${category.icon_image}" alt="${category.key}" class="img-responsive ph-image iconImg" error.trigger="getDefaultImg('assets/styles/images/default-category.jpg')"
                                    data-ph-at-id="category-image">
                            </figure> -->
                            <div class="category-info" role="text" data-ps="be6e1652-div-9" v-phw-setting>
                                <p class="title" title.bind="category.key" data-ps="be6e1652-p-2" v-phw-setting>${category.key}</p>
                                <p class="job-description" if.bind="category.description" data-ph-at-id="category-description" data-ph-at-data-text="${category.description}" data-ps="be6e1652-p-3" v-phw-setting>
                                    ${category.description}
                                </p>
                                <p class="job-count" if.bind="showEmptyCategories && !category.total_count && !hideJobCount" data-ps="be6e1652-p-4" v-phw-setting>
                                    <span data-ps="be6e1652-span-1" v-phw-setting>${widgetBundle['categoryCountPlural'] | pht} 
                                        <span class="job-count-figure" data-ps="be6e1652-span-2" v-phw-setting>(0)</span>
                                    </span>
                                </p>
                                <p class="job-count" if.bind="category.total_count > 1 && !hideJobCount" data-ps="be6e1652-p-5" v-phw-setting>
                                    <span data-ps="be6e1652-span-3" v-phw-setting>${widgetBundle['categoryCountPlural'] | pht} 
                                        <span class="job-count-figure" data-ps="be6e1652-span-4" v-phw-setting>(${category.total_count})</span>
                                    </span>
                                </p>
                                <p class="job-count" if.bind="category.total_count == 1 && !hideJobCount" data-ps="be6e1652-p-6" v-phw-setting>
                                    <span data-ps="be6e1652-span-5" v-phw-setting>${widgetBundle['categoryCountSingler'] | pht} 
                                        <span class="job-count-figure" data-ps="be6e1652-span-6" v-phw-setting>(${category.total_count})</span>
                                    </span>
                                </p>
                            </div>
                        </a>
                    </div>
                    <!--aria-label="${category.key} ${category.total_count} jobs" -->
                    <div repeat.for="category of categoryViewModel" show.bind="(mode != 'slider') && (type != 'subCategory')" class="col-md-${cardStyleClassSuffix} content-list-item" data-ps="be6e1652-div-10" v-phw-setting>
                        <a data-access-list-item="${$index}" ph-tevent="job_category_click" ref="linkEle" href="${getUrl(linkEle, 'category', category)}" class="category-${$index + 1} list-item-link" data-ph-at-id="category-link" data-ph-at-category-text="${category.key}" data-ph-at-category-job-count="${category.total_count}" aria-label="${category.key} ${category.total_count} ${category.total_count == 1 ? (widgetBundle['categoryCountSingler']) : (widgetBundle['categoryCountPlural'])}" data-ps="be6e1652-a-2" v-phw-setting>
                            <!-- <figure>
                                <img src="https://assets.phenompeople.com/CareerConnectResources/pp/PHENA0059/en_us/desktop/assets/images/header_hero.jpg" alt="${category.key}" class="img-responsive ph-image iconImg" error.trigger="getDefaultImg('assets/styles/images/default-category.jpg')"
                                    data-ph-at-id="category-image">
                            </figure> -->
                            <div class="category-info" role="text" data-ps="be6e1652-div-11" v-phw-setting>
                                <p class="title" title.bind="category.key" data-ps="be6e1652-p-7" v-phw-setting>${category.key}</p>
                                <p class="job-description" if.bind="category.description" data-ph-at-id="category-description" data-ph-at-data-text="${category.description}" data-ps="be6e1652-p-8" v-phw-setting>
                                    ${category.description}
                                </p>
                                <p class="job-count" if.bind="showEmptyCategories && !category.total_count && !hideJobCount" data-ps="be6e1652-p-9" v-phw-setting>
                                    <span data-ps="be6e1652-span-7" v-phw-setting>${widgetBundle['categoryCountPlural'] | pht} 
                                            <span class="job-count-figure" data-ps="be6e1652-span-8" v-phw-setting>(0)</span>
                                    </span>
                                </p>
                                <p class="job-count" if.bind="category.total_count > 1 && !hideJobCount" data-ps="be6e1652-p-10" v-phw-setting>
                                    <span data-ps="be6e1652-span-9" v-phw-setting>${widgetBundle['categoryCountPlural'] | pht} 
                                            <span class="job-count-figure" data-ps="be6e1652-span-10" v-phw-setting>(${category.total_count})</span>
                                    </span>
                                </p>
                                <p class="job-count" if.bind="category.total_count == 1 && !hideJobCount" data-ps="be6e1652-p-11" v-phw-setting>
                                    <span data-ps="be6e1652-span-11" v-phw-setting>${widgetBundle['categoryCountSingler'] | pht} 
                                            <span class="job-count-figure" data-ps="be6e1652-span-12" v-phw-setting>(${category.total_count})</span>
                                    </span>
                                </p>
                            </div>
                        </a>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <!--show when mode is showMore show all -->
                <div class="actions" if.bind="mode != 'slider'" data-ph-at-id="navigation" iskeyenabled.bind="isKeyPressEnabled = true" data-ps="be6e1652-div-12" v-phw-setting>
                    <a aria-live="assertive" aria-atomic="true" data-access="showMore" ph-tevent="see_more_click" ref="linkEle" href="javascript:void(0)" role="button" aria-label="View Even More" title="View Even More" class="action-btn" keyup.trigger="viewEvenMoreOnKeyup && viewEvenMoreOnKeyup($event)" click.delegate="viewEvenMore()" if.bind="!hideViewEvenMore" key-title="showMoreActionTitleText" key-aria-label="showMoreActionAriaLabelText" key-role="showMoreActionRole" data-ph-at-id="seemore-link" data-ps="be6e1652-a-3" v-phw-setting>
                        <ppc-content key="showMoreActionText" data-ph-at-id="seemore-text" data-ps="be6e1652-ppc-content-3" v-phw-setting>
                            Show More
                        </ppc-content>
                    </a>
                    <a aria-live="assertive" aria-atomic="true" data-access="showMore" ph-tevent="view_next_click" ref="linkEle1" href="javascript:void(0)" role="button" aria-label="View Next" title="View Next" class="action-btn" keyup.trigger="viewNextOnKeyup && viewNextOnKeyup($event)" click.delegate="viewNext()" if.bind="!hideViewNext" key-title="viewNextActionTitleText" key-aria-label="viewNextActionAriaLabelText" key-role="viewNextActionRole" data-ph-at-id="viewnext-link" data-ps="be6e1652-a-4" v-phw-setting>
                        <ppc-content key="viewNextActionText" data-ph-at-id="viewnext-text" data-ps="be6e1652-ppc-content-4" v-phw-setting>
                            View Next
                        </ppc-content>
                    </a>
                    <a aria-live="assertive" aria-atomic="true" data-access="showMore" ph-tevent="view_all_click" ref="linkEle2" href="javascript:void(0)" role="button" aria-label="View All" title="View All" class="action-btn" click.delegate="viewAll()" if.bind="!hideViewAll" key-title="viewAllActionTitleText" key-aria-label="viewAllActionAriaLabelText" key-role="viewAllActionRole" data-ph-at-id="viewall-link" data-ps="be6e1652-a-5" v-phw-setting>
                        <ppc-content key="viewAllActionText" data-ph-at-id="viewall-text" data-ps="be6e1652-ppc-content-5" v-phw-setting>
                            View All
                        </ppc-content>
                    </a>
                    <a data-access="showMore" ph-tevent="see_less_click" ref="linkEle3" href="javascript:void(0)" role="button" class="action-btn" aria-label="Show Less" title="Show Less" keyup.trigger="viewLessOnKeyup && viewLessOnKeyup($event)" click.delegate="viewLess()" if.bind="!hideLess" key-title="showLessActionTitleText" key-aria-label="showLessActionAriaLabelText" key-role="showLessActionRole" data-ph-at-id="seeless-link" data-ps="be6e1652-a-6" v-phw-setting>
                        <ppc-content key="showLessActionText" data-ph-at-id="seeless-text" data-ps="be6e1652-ppc-content-6" v-phw-setting>
                            Show Less
                        </ppc-content>
                    </a>
                </div>


                <!--show slider actions when mode is slider and mode option loop is true-->
                <div class="slider-actions ${modeOptions.navPosition}" if.bind="mode == 'slider' && !modeOptions.loop" data-ph-at-id="navigation" data-ps="be6e1652-div-13" v-phw-setting>
                    <a ph-tevent="previous_slider_click" role="button" aria-label="View Previous Slide" href="javascript:void(0)" class="slide-left" data-slide="prev" click.delegate="goToPrevSlide()" if.bind="currSlide > 0 && modeOptions.prev" title="View Previous Slide" key-title="previousSlideActionTitleText" key-aria-label="previousSlideActionAriaLabelText" key-role="previousSlideActionRole" data-ph-at-id="sliderprevious-link" data-ps="be6e1652-a-7" v-phw-setting>
                        <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-left-arrow" data-ps="be6e1652-i-1" v-phw-setting></i>
                        <ppc-content key="previousSlideText" data-ph-at-id="sliderprevious-text" data-ps="be6e1652-ppc-content-7" v-phw-setting> Previous</ppc-content>
                    </a>
                    <a ph-tevent="next_slider_click" role="button" aria-label="View Next Slide" href="javascript:void(0)" class="slide-right" data-slide="next" click.delegate="goToNextSlide()" if.bind="currSlide < totalSlides-1 && modeOptions.next" title="View Next Slide" key-title="nextSlideActionTitleText" key-aria-label="nextSlideActionAriaLabelText" key-role="nextSlideActionRole" data-ph-at-id="slidernext-link" data-ps="be6e1652-a-8" v-phw-setting>
                        <ppc-content key="nextSlideText" data-ph-at-id="slidernext-text" data-ps="be6e1652-ppc-content-8" v-phw-setting> Next </ppc-content>
                        <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-right" data-ps="be6e1652-i-2" v-phw-setting></i>
                    </a>
                    <div class="slider-indicators" data-ps="be6e1652-div-14" v-phw-setting>
                        <a ph-tevent="dot_slider_click" role="button" aria-label="View Slide ${$index+1}" href="javascript:void(0)" data-target="#" class="${$index == currSlide ? 'active' : ''}" repeat.for="eachIndicator of totalSlides" if.bind="totalSlides > 1 && modeOptions.indicators" click.delegate="goToSlide($index)" title="Slide ${$index+1}" data-ph-at-id="sliderdot-link" data-ps="be6e1652-a-9" v-phw-setting>
                        </a>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <!--show slider actions when mode is slider and mode option loop is false-->
                <div class="slider-actions ${modeOptions.navPosition}" if.bind="mode == 'slider' && modeOptions.loop" data-ph-at-id="navigation" data-ps="be6e1652-div-15" v-phw-setting>
                    <a ph-tevent="previous_slider_click" role="button" aria-label="View Previous Slide" href="javascript:void(0)" class="slide-left" data-slide="prev" click.delegate="goToPrevSlide()" if.bind="totalSlides > 1 && modeOptions.prev" title="View Previous Slide" key-title="previousSlideActionTitleText" key-aria-label="previousSlideActionAriaLabelText" key-role="previousSlideActionRole" data-ph-at-id="sliderprevious-link" data-ps="be6e1652-a-10" v-phw-setting>
                        <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-left-arrow" data-ps="be6e1652-i-3" v-phw-setting></i>
                        <ppc-content key="previousSlideText" data-ph-at-id="sliderprevious-text" data-ps="be6e1652-ppc-content-9" v-phw-setting> Previous</ppc-content>
                    </a>
                    <a ph-tevent="next_slider_click" role="button" aria-label="View Next Slide" href="javascript:void(0)" class="slide-right" data-slide="next" click.delegate="goToNextSlide()" if.bind="totalSlides > 1 && modeOptions.next" title="View Next Slide" key-title="nextSlideActionTitleText" key-aria-label="nextSlideActionAriaLabelText" key-role="nextSlideActionRole" data-ph-at-id="slidernext-link" data-ps="be6e1652-a-11" v-phw-setting>
                        <ppc-content key="nextSlideText" data-ph-at-id="slidernext-text" data-ps="be6e1652-ppc-content-10" v-phw-setting> Next </ppc-content>
                        <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-arrow-right" data-ps="be6e1652-i-4" v-phw-setting></i>
                    </a>
                    <div class="slider-indicators" data-ps="be6e1652-div-16" v-phw-setting>
                        <a ph-tevent="dot_slider_click" role="button" aria-label="View Slide ${$index+1}" href="javascript:void(0)" data-target="#" class="${$index == currSlide ? 'active' : ''}" repeat.for="eachIndicator of totalSlides" if.bind="totalSlides > 1 && modeOptions.indicators" click.delegate="goToSlide($index)" title="Slide ${$index+1}" data-ph-at-id="sliderdot-link" data-ps="be6e1652-a-12" v-phw-setting>
                        </a>
                    </div>
                </div>

            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="no-data-view" if.bind="showErrorMsg" data-ph-at-id="nodata-block" data-ps="be6e1652-div-17" v-phw-setting>
            <p data-ps="be6e1652-p-12" v-phw-setting>
                <ppc-content key="noDataViewText" data-ph-at-id="nodata-text" data-ps="be6e1652-ppc-content-11" v-phw-setting>
                    No Categories.
                </ppc-content>
            </p>
        </div>
    </div>
</div></script><script id="ph-create-job-alert-v1-default" type="text/x-ph-tmpl"><div class="show-loader" ph-loading-img="show-loader.bind: showLoader" if.bind="showLoader" data-ps="0e9561da-div-1" v-phw-setting>
</div>
<div class="phs-create-job-alert-area ph-widget-box" role="region" key-role="createJobAlertArea" aria-label="Create Job Alert" key-aria-label="createJobAlertAreaLabel" data-ps="0e9561da-div-2" v-phw-setting>
    <div aria-live="assertive" aria-atomic="true" data-ps="0e9561da-div-3" v-phw-setting>
        <div class="no-job-error" if.bind="showNoJobErrorMsg" data-ps="0e9561da-div-4" v-phw-setting>
            <ppc-content key="createJobAlertErrorText" data-ps="0e9561da-ppc-content-1" v-phw-setting>
                You have no job criteria selected. Please select at least one search filter to create a job alert.
            </ppc-content>
        </div>
        <div class="no-job-error" if.bind="showDuplicateErrorMsg" data-ps="0e9561da-div-5" v-phw-setting>
            <ppc-content key="createJobAlertDuplicateErrorText" data-ps="0e9561da-ppc-content-2" v-phw-setting>
                This job alert already exists. To create another job alert, please select other job criteria.
            </ppc-content>
        </div>
        <div class="no-job-error" if.bind="isAlertActivated" data-ps="0e9561da-div-6" v-phw-setting>
            <ppc-content key="createJobAlertAlreadyActivatedText" data-ps="0e9561da-ppc-content-3" v-phw-setting>
                This job alert is already activated. To create another job alert, please select other job criteria.
            </ppc-content>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div data-ps="0e9561da-div-7" v-phw-setting>
        <div class="heading-block" data-ps="0e9561da-div-8" v-phw-setting>
            <div class="icon-area" data-ps="0e9561da-div-9" v-phw-setting>
                <i class="icon icon-notify" aria-hidden="true" data-ps="0e9561da-i-1" v-phw-setting></i>
            </div>
            <div class="heading-area" data-ps="0e9561da-div-10" v-phw-setting>
                <h2 data-ps="0e9561da-h2-1" v-phw-setting>
                    <ppc-content key="createJobAlertHeadingText" data-ph-at-id="heading-text" data-ps="0e9561da-ppc-content-4" v-phw-setting>
                        Create Job Alert
                    </ppc-content>
                </h2>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div if.bind="hideJobAlert" class="job-alert-area" data-ps="0e9561da-div-11" v-phw-setting>
            <div class="sub-heading" data-ps="0e9561da-div-12" v-phw-setting>
                <ppc-content key="noteText" data-ph-at-id="sub-heading-text" data-ps="0e9561da-ppc-content-5" v-phw-setting>
                    NOTE: Use refine search filters above to get better job alerts
                </ppc-content>
            </div>
            <div data-ps="0e9561da-div-13" v-phw-setting>
                <label class="email" for="jobAlertEmailAddress" data-ps="0e9561da-label-1" v-phw-setting>
                    <ppc-content key="eMailAddressText" data-ph-at-id="email-label-text" data-ps="0e9561da-ppc-content-6" v-phw-setting>
                        Email Address
                    </ppc-content>
                    <span class="sr-only" data-ps="0e9561da-span-1" v-phw-setting>Required</span>
                </label>
                <form role="form" submit.delegate="validateEmail()" novalidate data-ps="0e9561da-form-1" v-phw-setting>
                    <div class.bind="piiConsentError ? 'consent-error-present' : '' " data-ps="0e9561da-div-14" v-phw-setting>
                        <div class="email-input" data-ps="0e9561da-div-15" v-phw-setting>
                            <input aria-label="Enter email address" key-aria-label="enterEmailLabell" type="email" placeholder="Enter email address" key-placeholder="enterEmailPlaceholderTextt" id="jobAlertEmailAddress" value.bind="createJobAlertModel.email" autocomplete="email" disabled.bind="isDisabled" class="${isDisabled?'disabled':''} fs-block" data-ph-at-id="email-input" aria-required="true" aria-describedby="jobAlertErrorMessage" data-ps="0e9561da-input-1" v-phw-setting>
                            <!-- <span class="edit-icon">
                                    <i class="icon icon-edit-icon-fill" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                                </span> -->
                        </div>

                        <div aria-live="assertive" aria-atomic="true" id="jobAlertErrorMessage" data-ps="0e9561da-div-16" v-phw-setting>
                            <span class="error" if.bind="hasErrors && errors.email == 'E101'" data-ps="0e9561da-span-2" v-phw-setting>
                                <ppc-content key="emailEmptyText" data-ph-at-id="email-empty-validation-text" data-ps="0e9561da-ppc-content-7" v-phw-setting> E-mail
                                    should not be empty </ppc-content>
                            </span>
                            <span class="error" if.bind="hasErrors && errors.email == 'E102'" data-ps="0e9561da-span-3" v-phw-setting>
                                <ppc-content key="enterValidEMailAddressText" data-ph-at-id="email-invalid-validation-text" data-ps="0e9561da-ppc-content-8" v-phw-setting> Please enter Valid E-mail address
                                </ppc-content>
                            </span>
                            <span class="error" if.bind="hasErrors && errors.email != 'E101' && errors.email != 'E102'" data-ps="0e9561da-span-4" v-phw-setting>
                                <ppc-content key="errorMessageText" data-ph-at-id="error-message-validation-text" data-ps="0e9561da-ppc-content-9" v-phw-setting>
                                    Something went wrong. Please try again </ppc-content>
                            </span>
                        </div>

                        <div class="manage-frequency" data-ph-at-id="mail-frequency-block" data-ps="0e9561da-div-17" v-phw-setting>
                            <label class="email" for="frequency" data-ps="0e9561da-label-2" v-phw-setting>
                                <ppc-content key="getEmailsText" data-ph-at-id="mail-frequency-text" data-ps="0e9561da-ppc-content-10" v-phw-setting>You'll get emails
                                </ppc-content>
                                <span class="sr-only" data-ps="0e9561da-span-5" v-phw-setting>Required</span>
                            </label>
                            <div class="select-holder" data-ps="0e9561da-div-18" v-phw-setting>
                                <select id="frequency" name="frequency" value.bind="createJobAlertModel.frequency" data-ph-at-id="mail-frequency-drp-dwn" aria-label="you'll get emails, select frequency" key-aria-label="selectFreq" required data-ps="0e9561da-select-1" v-phw-setting>
                                    <option value.bind="freq.key" repeat.for="freq of masterFrequency" data-ph-at-id="mail-frequency-drp-dwn-opt" data-ph-at-text="${widgetBundle[freq.literalkey] | pht}" data-ps="0e9561da-option-1" v-phw-setting>
                                        ${widgetBundle[freq.literalkey] | pht}</option>
                                </select>
                                <i class="icon icon-down-arrow" aria-hidden="true" data-ps="0e9561da-i-2" v-phw-setting></i>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="pii-consent-section" if.bind="piiConsentData && piiConsentData.length && piiConsentData.length < 3" data-ps="0e9561da-div-19" v-phw-setting>
                            <div class="consent-info-heading" innerhtml.bind="(widgetBundle.piiconsentInfoHeading || '')|pht | sanitizeHTML" data-ps="0e9561da-div-20" v-phw-setting></div>
                            <label repeat.for="eachConsent of piiConsentData" class="pii-consent-label" data-ps="0e9561da-label-3" v-phw-setting>
                                <input type="checkbox" class="pii-consent-input" aria-labelledby="${'checkbox-label-crjob' + $index}" aria-describedby="${!eachConsent.optional ? 'consent-error-crjob' : '' }" checked.bind="eachConsent.isChecked" aria-checked="${eachConsent.isChecked?'true':'false'}" aria-required="${!eachConsent.optional ? 'true': false}" data-ps="0e9561da-input-2" v-phw-setting>
                                <span class="checkbox-selected" aria-hidden="true" data-ps="0e9561da-span-6" v-phw-setting></span>
                                <span class="checkbox-unselect" aria-hidden="true" data-ps="0e9561da-span-7" v-phw-setting></span>
                                <span class="checkbox-text" data-ps="0e9561da-span-8" v-phw-setting>
                                    <span id="${'checkbox-label-crjob' + $index}" innerhtml="${widgetBundle[eachConsent.type + 'Text']}" data-ps="0e9561da-span-9" v-phw-setting> </span>
                                    <span class="consent-mandatory" aria-hidden="true" if.bind="!eachConsent.optional" data-ps="0e9561da-span-10" v-phw-setting>*</span>
                                </span>
                            </label>
                            <div class="consent-info-description" innerhtml.bind="(widgetBundle.piiconsentInfoDescription || '')|pht | sanitizeHTML" data-ps="0e9561da-div-21" v-phw-setting></div>
                        </div>
                        <section if.bind="piiConsentData && piiConsentData.length && piiConsentData.length >= 3" class="ph-widget" instance-id="crjob" data-ps="0e9561da-section-1" v-phw-setting>
                            <div as-element="ph-consent-popup-v1" widget-context.bind="piiConsentContext" data-widget="ph-consent-popup-v1" class="ph-consent-popup-v1-default-default" view="default" instance-id="crjob" data-ps="0e9561da-div-22" v-phw-setting>
                            </div>
                        </section>

                        <div aria-atomic="true" data-ps="0e9561da-div-23" v-phw-setting>
                            <span class="pii-consent-error error" id="consent-error-crjob" if.bind="piiConsentError" data-ps="0e9561da-span-11" v-phw-setting>
                                ${widgetBundle['piiConsentError'] | pht}
                            </span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="job-alert" data-ps="0e9561da-div-24" v-phw-setting>
                            <button class="btn plain-button create-jobAlert-button" role="button" key-role="btnRole" aria-label="Create Job Alert" ph-tevent="career_alerts_click" key-aria-label="createJobAlertButton" data-ph-at-id="create-job-alert-button" data-ps="0e9561da-button-1" v-phw-setting>
                                ${widgetBundle['createJobAlertButtonText'] | pht}
                            </button>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </form>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <!-- <div show.bind="!isLoggedIn && manageAlertStatus"> -->
    <div class="create-alert-by-mail" data-ps="0e9561da-div-25" v-phw-setting>
        
    <div class="ph-a11y-create-alert-submit" tabindex="-1" data-ps="0e9561da-div-26" v-phw-setting>
            <div if.bind="isEmailValidationEnabled && showSuccessMsg && isAlertCreated" class="success-alert" data-ph-at-id="succ-alert-managed-alerts" role="text" data-ps="0e9561da-div-27" v-phw-setting>
                <div class="rc-icon" data-ps="0e9561da-div-28" v-phw-setting>
                    <i class="icon icon-check-mark" data-ps="0e9561da-i-3" v-phw-setting></i>
                </div>
                <div class="alert-success-text" data-ps="0e9561da-div-29" v-phw-setting>
                    <ppc-content key="jobAlertCreatedSuccessfullyText" data-ph-at-id="job-alert-succ-text" data-ps="0e9561da-ppc-content-11" v-phw-setting>
                        Job alert created successfully
                    </ppc-content>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div if.bind="isEmailValidationEnabled && showSuccessMsg && !isAlertCreated" class="email-sent" data-ph-at-id="succ-alert-unmanaged-alerts" data-ps="0e9561da-div-30" v-phw-setting>
            <!-- <div class="icon-area">
                <i class="icon icon-info" aria-hidden="true"></i>
            </div> -->

    <div class="phs-refine-block" role="region" key-role="regionRole" aria-label="Refine your search" key-aria-label="facetSearchHeadingAriaLabel" data-ps="1c680c5e-div-2" v-phw-setting>

                    <ppc-content data-ph-at-id="heading-text" key="facetSearchHeading" data-ps="1c680c5e-ppc-content-1" v-phw-setting>

                </h2>
            </div>
        </div>

            <div class="panel panel-default refine-widget" repeat.for="facetKey of searchFacetKeys" data-ph-at-id="facet-${facetKey.key}" data-ph-at-text="${facetKey.key}" data-ps="1c680c5e-div-7" v-phw-setting>
                <!-- facet heading { bindings :  facetKey }-->

'true' : 'false'}" click.delegate="adjustAccordian($index)" data-ph-at-id="facet-heading-link" data-ph-at-text="${facetDisplayNames[facetKey.key]}" data-ps="1c680c5e-button-1" v-phw-setting>

'true' : 'false'}" key-role="chkboxRole" model.bind="facet" checked.bind="facet.checked" change.delegate="filterChanged(facet, facetKey.key)" data-ph-at-id="facet-checkbox" data-ph-at-facetkey="facet-${facetKey.key}" data-ph-at-text="${facet.name}" data-ph-at-count="${facet.count}" aria-label="${facet.name} ${facet.count} ${facet.count > 1? 'false': 'true'" data-ps="1c680c5e-ul-2" v-phw-setting>

                <label repeat.for="eachConsent of widgetContext.consentData" class="pii-consent-label" data-ps="8d6a500f-label-1" v-phw-setting>
                    <input type="checkbox" class="pii-consent-input" aria-labelledby="${'checkbox-label-' + instanceId + $index}" aria-describedby="${!eachConsent.optional ? 'consent-error-' + instanceId : ''}" checked.bind="eachConsent.isChecked" aria-checked="${eachConsent.isChecked?'true':'false'}" aria-required="${!eachConsent.optional ? 'true':false}" change.delegate="isButtonDisabled()" data-ps="8d6a500f-input-1" v-phw-setting>
                    <span class="checkbox-selected" aria-hidden="true" data-ps="8d6a500f-span-2" v-phw-setting></span>

</div></script><script type="text/x-ph-tmpl" id="ph-social-share-v3-default"><div class="phs-widget-block-area ph-widget-box" data-ps="9ba52d27-div-1" v-phw-setting>

'' : (shareOption.borderColor)}; border-style: ${shareOption.brandStyle ? '' : (shareOption.borderStyle)};" data-ph-at-id="share-${eachIndicator['name']}-link" focus.trigger="closeShareJob($event, true)" blur.trigger="closeShareJob($event, false)" data-ps="9ba52d27-button-1" v-phw-setting>

                <div class="head-wrapper" data-ps="9ba52d27-div-10" v-phw-setting>
                    <h3 class="head-text" data-ph-at-id="social_share_popup_heading" data-ps="9ba52d27-h3-1" v-phw-setting>
                        <ppc-content key="copyLinkHeaderText" data-ps="9ba52d27-ppc-content-3" v-phw-setting>Share job link</ppc-content>
                    </h3>
                    <button type="button" class="btn-close" aria-label="close dialog" key-aria-label="closeDialogAriaLabel" data-ph-at-id="social_share_popup_head_button" click.delegate="copyLinkCancelAction()" data-ps="9ba52d27-button-2" v-phw-setting>
                        <i class="icon icon-cancel" aria-hidden="true" data-ph-at-id="social_share_popup_head_button_icon" data-ps="9ba52d27-i-2" v-phw-setting></i>
                    </button>
                </div>
                <div class="popup-body-wrapper" data-ph-at-id="social_share_popup_body_wrapper" data-ps="9ba52d27-div-11" v-phw-setting>
                    <div class="message-wrapper" if.bind="showCopySuccess" data-ps="9ba52d27-div-12" v-phw-setting>
                        <p class="message-text" data-ph-at-id="social_share_popup_body_message" data-ps="9ba52d27-p-2" v-phw-setting>
                            <ppc-content key="messageText" data-ps="9ba52d27-ppc-content-4" v-phw-setting>Link copied successfully</ppc-content>
                        </p>
                    </div>
                    <label class="field-label" data-ph-at-id="social_share_popup_body_field_label" id="field-label-1" data-ps="9ba52d27-label-1" v-phw-setting><ppc-content key="internalExternalFieldLabel" data-ps="9ba52d27-ppc-content-5" v-phw-setting>To your colleagues or friends</ppc-content></label>
                    <input type="text" class="form-control input-copy-link" data-ph-at-id="social_share_popup_body_job_link_input" value.bind="jobLink" readonly aria-labelledby="field-label" data-ps="9ba52d27-input-1" v-phw-setting>
                </div>
                <div class="button-wrapper" data-ph-at-id="social_share_popup_body_button_wrapper" data-ps="9ba52d27-div-13" v-phw-setting>
                    <button type="button" class="btn-cancel" data-ph-at-id="social_share_popup_body_cancel_button" click.delegate="copyLinkCancelAction()" data-ps="9ba52d27-button-3" v-phw-setting><ppc-content key="cancelButtonText" data-ps="9ba52d27-ppc-content-6" v-phw-setting>Cancel</ppc-content></button>
                    <button type="button" class="btn primary-button" data-ph-at-id="social_share_popup_body_copylink_button" click.delegate="copyLink()" data-ps="9ba52d27-button-4" v-phw-setting><ppc-content key="copyLinkButtonText" data-ps="9ba52d27-ppc-content-7" v-phw-setting>Copy Link</ppc-content></button>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div></script><script data-requiremodule="https://pp-cdn.phenompeople.com/CareerConnectResources/pp/agWidgets/ph-email-job-v1-view3-3.js" src="https://pp-cdn.phenompeople.com/CareerConnectResources/pp/agWidgets/ph-email-job-v1-view3-3.js" async="" data-requirecontext="_" type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8"></script><script type="text/x-ph-tmpl" id="ph-range-slider-v1-default"></script><script id="ph-email-job-v1-view3" type="text/x-ph-tmpl"><!-- View specifically written for the inside of configuarable social share widget Because of when email is inline view when click on the email option it should in popup view -->

<div class="phs-email-this-job-area ph-widget-box" data-ph-at-id="email-this-job" data-ps="dc8a350c-div-1" v-phw-setting>
    <!-- <div class="modal-backdrop fade in"></div> -->
    <div class="modal fade in show" role="dialog" data-ps="dc8a350c-div-2" v-phw-setting>
        <div class="modal-dialog" role="document" data-ps="dc8a350c-div-3" v-phw-setting>
            <div class="modal-content" data-ps="dc8a350c-div-4" v-phw-setting>
                <div class="phs-widget-heading" data-ps="dc8a350c-div-5" v-phw-setting>
                    <!--<i class="icon icon-send-masseg"></i>-->
                    <button class="close-dialog" click.delegate="closeEmailDialog(share)" data-ph-at-id="close-the-popup-button" data-ps="dc8a350c-button-1" v-phw-setting>
                        <i class="icon icon-cancel" aria-hidden="true" data-ps="dc8a350c-i-1" v-phw-setting></i>
                        <span class="sr-only" data-ps="dc8a350c-span-1" v-phw-setting><ppc-content key="closePopupText" data-ph-at-id="close-the-popup-text" data-ps="dc8a350c-ppc-content-1" v-phw-setting>Close
                                the popup</ppc-content></span>
                    </button>
                    <h2 data-ps="dc8a350c-h2-1" v-phw-setting>
                        <ppc-content key="widgetHeadingText" data-ph-at-id="email-this-job-heading-text" data-ps="dc8a350c-ppc-content-2" v-phw-setting>
                            Email this Job
                        </ppc-content>
                    </h2>
                    <p class="phs-widget-sub-title" data-ps="dc8a350c-p-1" v-phw-setting>
                        <ppc-content key="widgetSubHeadingText" data-ph-at-id="email-this-job-sub-title-text" data-ps="dc8a350c-ppc-content-3" v-phw-setting>
                            To access this job from another computer, email this information to yourself or a friend.
                        </ppc-content>
                    </p>
                </div>
                <div class="widget-container" data-ps="dc8a350c-div-6" v-phw-setting>
                    <div class="content-block" data-ps="dc8a350c-div-7" v-phw-setting>
                        <form role="form" submit.delegate="emailThisJob()" class="form-inline" data-ps="dc8a350c-form-1" v-phw-setting>
                            <div class="pii-consent-section" if.bind="piiConsentData && piiConsentData.length" data-ps="dc8a350c-div-8" v-phw-setting>
                                <div class="consent-info-heading" innerhtml.bind="(widgetBundle.piiconsentInfoHeading || '')|pht | sanitizeHTML" data-ps="dc8a350c-div-9" v-phw-setting></div>
                                <label repeat.for="eachConsent of piiConsentData" class="pii-consent-label" data-ps="dc8a350c-label-1" v-phw-setting>
                                    <input type="checkbox" class="pii-consent-input" aria-describedby="consent-error" checked.bind="eachConsent.isChecked" aria-checked="${eachConsent.isChecked?'true':'false'}" aria-required="!eachConsent.optional" data-ps="dc8a350c-input-1" v-phw-setting>
                                    <span class="checkbox-selected" aria-hidden="true" data-ps="dc8a350c-span-2" v-phw-setting></span>
                                    <span class="checkbox-unselect" aria-hidden="true" data-ps="dc8a350c-span-3" v-phw-setting></span>
                                    <span class="checkbox-text" innerhtml="${widgetBundle[eachConsent.type + 'Text'] | pht}" data-ps="dc8a350c-span-4" v-phw-setting> </span>
                                </label>
                            </div>
                            <div aria-live="assertive" aria-atomic="true" data-ps="dc8a350c-div-10" v-phw-setting>
                                <span class="pii-consent-error" id="consent-error" if.bind="piiConsentError" data-ps="dc8a350c-span-5" v-phw-setting>
                                    ${widgetBundle['piiConsentError'] | pht}
                                </span>
                            </div>
                            <div class="form-group ${errors.name.error ? 'error focus':''}" data-ps="dc8a350c-div-11" v-phw-setting>
                                <label for="email-job-name" data-ps="dc8a350c-label-2" v-phw-setting>
                                    <ppc-content key="nameLabelText" data-ph-at-id="name-label-text" data-ps="dc8a350c-ppc-content-4" v-phw-setting>
                                        Your Name
                                    </ppc-content>
                                </label>
                                <input type="text" aria-describedby="ph-a11y-email-job-name-field-error" class="form-control ph-a11y-form-control-name fs-block" value.bind="emailJobModel.name" placeholder="Your name" autocomplete="off" key-placeholder="nameInputPlaceholderText" title="Your name" key-title="recipientNameTitleText" data-ph-at-id="name-input" id="email-job-name" name="email-job-name" data-ps="dc8a350c-input-2" v-phw-setting>
                                <span class="error" id="ph-a11y-email-job-name-field-error" if.bind="errors.name.error && errors.name.code == 'E101'" data-ps="dc8a350c-span-6" v-phw-setting>
                                    <ppc-content key="nameErrorText" data-ph-at-id="name-validation-text" data-ps="dc8a350c-ppc-content-5" v-phw-setting>
                                        Name should not be empty
                                    </ppc-content>
                                </span>
                            </div>
                            <div class="form-group ${errors.email.error ? 'error focus':''}" data-ps="dc8a350c-div-12" v-phw-setting>
                                <label for="email-job-email" data-ps="dc8a350c-label-3" v-phw-setting>
                                    <ppc-content key="emailLabelText" data-ph-at-id="email-label-text" data-ps="dc8a350c-ppc-content-6" v-phw-setting>
                                        Recipient's Email address
                                    </ppc-content>
                                </label>
                                <input type="text" aria-describedby="ph-a11y-email-job-email-field-error" class="form-control ph-a11y-form-control-email fs-block" value.bind="emailJobModel.email" placeholder="Recipient's Email address" title="Recipients Email address" key-title="recipientEmailAddressTitleText" autocomplete="off" data-ph-at-id="email-input" id="email-job-email" name="email-job-email" data-ps="dc8a350c-input-3" v-phw-setting>
                                    <span class="error" id="ph-a11y-email-job-email-field-error" if.bind="errors.email.error && errors.email.code == 'E101'" data-ps="dc8a350c-span-7" v-phw-setting>
                                        <ppc-content key="emailShouldNotBeEmptyText" data-ph-at-id="email-empty-validation-text" data-ps="dc8a350c-ppc-content-7" v-phw-setting>
                                            Recipients email address should not be Empty
                                        </ppc-content>
                                    </span>
                                    <span class="error" id="ph-a11y-email-job-email-field-error" if.bind="errors.email.error && errors.email.code == 'E102'" data-ps="dc8a350c-span-8" v-phw-setting>
                                        <ppc-content key="pleaseEnterAValidEmailText" data-ph-at-id="email-invalid-validation-text" data-ps="dc8a350c-ppc-content-8" v-phw-setting>
                                            Please enter a valid Recipients email address
                                        </ppc-content>
                                    </span>
                            </div>
                            <div class="form-group" data-ps="dc8a350c-div-13" v-phw-setting>
                                <button type="submit" class="btn primary-button ph-a11y-email-submit" tabindex="0" data-ph-at-id="send-button" data-ps="dc8a350c-button-2" v-phw-setting>
                                    <ppc-content key="sendButtonText" data-ph-at-id="send-text" data-ps="dc8a350c-ppc-content-9" v-phw-setting>
                                        ${widgetBundle['sendEmailButtonText'] | pht}
                                    </ppc-content>
                                </button>
                            </div>
                        </form>
                        <div class="pii-consent-section" if.bind="piiConsentData && piiConsentData.length && piiConsentData.length < 3" data-ps="dc8a350c-div-14" v-phw-setting>
                            <div class="consent-info-heading" innerhtml.bind="(widgetBundle.piiconsentInfoHeading || '')|pht | sanitizeHTML" data-ps="dc8a350c-div-15" v-phw-setting></div>
                            <label repeat.for="eachConsent of piiConsentData" class="pii-consent-label" data-ps="dc8a350c-label-4" v-phw-setting>
                                <input type="checkbox" class="pii-consent-input" aria-labelledby="${'checkbox-label-dk-signup' + $index}" aria-describedby="${!eachConsent.optional ? 'consent-error-dk-signup' : '' }" checked.bind="eachConsent.isChecked" aria-checked="${eachConsent.isChecked?'true':'false'}" aria-required="${!eachConsent.optional ? 'true': false}" data-ps="dc8a350c-input-4" v-phw-setting>
                                <span class="checkbox-selected" aria-hidden="true" data-ps="dc8a350c-span-9" v-phw-setting></span>
                                <span class="checkbox-unselect" aria-hidden="true" data-ps="dc8a350c-span-10" v-phw-setting></span>
                                <span class="checkbox-text" data-ps="dc8a350c-span-11" v-phw-setting>
                                    <span id="${'checkbox-label-dk-signup' + $index}" innerhtml="${widgetBundle[eachConsent.type + 'Text']}" data-ps="dc8a350c-span-12" v-phw-setting> </span>
                                    <span class="consent-mandatory" aria-hidden="true" if.bind="!eachConsent.optional" data-ps="dc8a350c-span-13" v-phw-setting>*</span>
                                </span>
                            </label>
                        </div>

                        <a href="javascript:void(0)" if.bind="piiConsentData && piiConsentData.length && piiConsentData.length >= 3" class="consents-link" click.delegate="consentsForm()" data-ph-at-id="consents-link" ph-tevent="pii-popup-link" data-ps="dc8a350c-a-1" v-phw-setting>
                            <span class="sr-only required-text" data-ps="dc8a350c-span-14" v-phw-setting> ${widgetBundle['requiredText']} </span>
                            ${widgetBundle['consentsLinkText']}
                        </a>


                        <div class="feedbackText sr-only" tabindex="-1" blur.trigger="onBtnBlurHandler($event)" data-ps="dc8a350c-div-16" v-phw-setting>
                            <span show.bind="showEmailSuccess" data-ps="dc8a350c-span-15" v-phw-setting>
                                <ppc-content key="sendSuccessDescription1" data-ph-at-id="send-success-descript1" data-ps="dc8a350c-ppc-content-10" v-phw-setting>Email has
                                    successfully sent</ppc-content>
                            </span>
                            <span show.bind="showEmailFailure" data-ps="dc8a350c-span-16" v-phw-setting>
                                <ppc-content key="sendFailureDescription1" data-ph-at-id="send-failure-descript1" data-ps="dc8a350c-ppc-content-11" v-phw-setting>Email has
                                    sent has error</ppc-content>
                            </span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="popup-modal-backdrop" show.bind="showEmailSuccess" data-ps="dc8a350c-div-17" v-phw-setting>
    <div class="phs-email-this-job-area ph-widget-box success-hdlr popup-modal-backdrop" role="dialog" data-ps="dc8a350c-div-18" v-phw-setting>
        <!-- <div class="modal-backdrop fade in" click.delegate="closeEmailDialog()"></div> -->
        <div class="hdlr-block" tabindex="0" data-ps="dc8a350c-div-19" v-phw-setting>
            <i class="icon icon-check" data-ps="dc8a350c-i-2" v-phw-setting></i>
            <h3 data-ps="dc8a350c-h3-1" v-phw-setting>
                <ppc-content key="sendSuccessText" data-ph-at-id="send-success-text" data-ps="dc8a350c-ppc-content-12" v-phw-setting>Success!</ppc-content>
            </h3>
            <p data-ps="dc8a350c-p-2" v-phw-setting>
                <ppc-content key="sendSuccessDescription" data-ph-at-id="send-success-descript" data-ps="dc8a350c-ppc-content-13" v-phw-setting>Email has successfully sent</ppc-content>
            </p>
            <button type="button" class="btn primary-button" if.bind="isDialog" show.bind="showDialogPopup" click.delegate="closeEmailDialog(share)" data-ps="dc8a350c-button-3" v-phw-setting>
                <ppc-content key="closePopupButtonText" data-ps="dc8a350c-ppc-content-14" v-phw-setting>Ok</ppc-content>
            </button>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="popup-modal-backdrop" show.bind="showEmailFailure" data-ps="dc8a350c-div-20" v-phw-setting>
    <div class="phs-email-this-job-area ph-widget-box failure-hdlr" role="dialog" data-ps="dc8a350c-div-21" v-phw-setting>
        <!-- <div class="modal-backdrop fade in" click.delegate="closeEmailDialog(share)"></div> -->
        <div class="hdlr-block" data-ps="dc8a350c-div-22" v-phw-setting>
            <i class="icon icon-cancel" data-ps="dc8a350c-i-3" v-phw-setting></i>
            <h3 data-ps="dc8a350c-h3-2" v-phw-setting>
                <ppc-content key="sendFailedText" data-ph-at-id="send-failed-text" data-ps="dc8a350c-ppc-content-15" v-phw-setting>Failure!</ppc-content>
            </h3>
            <p data-ps="dc8a350c-p-3" v-phw-setting>
                <ppc-content key="sendFailedDescription" data-ph-at-id="send-failed-descript" data-ps="dc8a350c-ppc-content-16" v-phw-setting>Email has not sent</ppc-content>
            </p>
            <button type="button" class="btn primary-button" if.bind="isDialog" show.bind="showDialogPopup" click.delegate="closeEmailDialog(share)" data-ps="dc8a350c-button-4" v-phw-setting>
                <ppc-content key="closePopupButtonText" data-ps="dc8a350c-ppc-content-17" v-phw-setting>Ok</ppc-content>
            </button>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<div class="popup-modal-backdrop" show.bind="showConsentsForm && piiConsentData && piiConsentData.length >= 3" data-ps="dc8a350c-div-23" v-phw-setting>
    <div class="modal-dialog consent-form-modal" if.bind="showConsentsForm && piiConsentData && piiConsentData.length >= 3" data-ps="dc8a350c-div-24" v-phw-setting>
        <button class="btn back-btn" aria-label="go back" ph-tevent="pii-consent-close" click.delegate="showConsentsForm = !showConsentsForm" data-ps="dc8a350c-button-5" v-phw-setting>
            <i class="icon icon-arrow-left-2" aria-hidden="true" data-ps="dc8a350c-i-4" v-phw-setting></i>
        </button>

        <h2 class="consent-heading" id="consent-heading" data-ph-at-id="consent-text" data-ps="dc8a350c-h2-2" v-phw-setting>
            ${widgetBundle['consentHeading']}
        </h2>

        <div class="pii-consent-section" if.bind="piiConsentData && piiConsentData.length" data-ps="dc8a350c-div-25" v-phw-setting>
            <div class="consent-info-heading" innerhtml.bind="(widgetBundle.piiconsentInfoHeading || '')|pht | sanitizeHTML" data-ps="dc8a350c-div-26" v-phw-setting></div>
            <label repeat.for="eachConsent of piiConsentData" class="pii-consent-label" data-ps="dc8a350c-label-5" v-phw-setting>
                <input type="checkbox" class="pii-consent-input" aria-labelledby="${'checkbox-label-dk-signup' + $index}" aria-describedby="${!eachConsent.optional ? 'consent-error-dk-signup' : '' }" checked.bind="eachConsent.isChecked" aria-checked="${eachConsent.isChecked?'true':'false'}" aria-required="${!eachConsent.optional ? 'true': false}" change.delegate="isButtonDisabled()" data-ps="dc8a350c-input-5" v-phw-setting>
                <span class="checkbox-selected" aria-hidden="true" data-ps="dc8a350c-span-17" v-phw-setting></span>
                <span class="checkbox-unselect" aria-hidden="true" data-ps="dc8a350c-span-18" v-phw-setting></span>
                <span class="checkbox-text" data-ps="dc8a350c-span-19" v-phw-setting>
                    <span id="${'checkbox-label-dk-signup' + $index}" innerhtml="${widgetBundle[eachConsent.type + 'Text']}" data-ps="dc8a350c-span-20" v-phw-setting> </span>
                    <span class="consent-mandatory" aria-hidden="true" if.bind="!eachConsent.optional" data-ps="dc8a350c-span-21" v-phw-setting>*</span>
                </span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="consent-accept-area" data-ps="dc8a350c-div-27" v-phw-setting>
            <button class="btn primary-button ph-a11y-allow-consent" click.delegate="!submitData ? closeConsentsForm() : signUp() " data-ph-at-id="consent-done-link" disabled.bind="isDisabled" data-ps="dc8a350c-button-6" v-phw-setting>
                ${!submitData ? widgetBundle['doneText'] || 'done': widgetBundle['createAccountButtonText']}
            </button>
        </div>
    </div>
</div></script><style type="text/css">.aurelia-hide { display:none !important; }</style>
